name: Merck & Co., Inc.
summary: Merck & Co., Inc. is a leading American multinational pharmaceutical company headquartered in Rahway, New Jersey. Founded in 1891, Merck develops and produces medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, and animal health products, and is recognized as one of the world's largest pharmaceutical firms by revenue. The company is known for its significant contributions to medical research and innovation, including several blockbuster drugs and vaccines.
